meanings.definition: A room containing a bathtub or shower and usually a sink and toilet.
meanings.sent1: The bathrooms in our house have a bathtub and a sink.
meanings.sent2: I need to use the bathrooms before we leave.
meanings.sent3: The bathrooms at the park were so clean, it was surprising!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a well-lit bathroom.
meanings.sent5: The bathrooms at the hotel were like a spa retreat.

meanings.definition: A room or building equipped with one or more toilets.
meanings.sent1: The office bathrooms are always stocked with toilet paper.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't find the bathrooms in the mall, so I asked for directions.
meanings.sent3: The bathrooms at the zoo had funny signs on the doors.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a crowded bathroom, full of thoughts swirling around.
meanings.sent5: The bathrooms at the gas station were surprisingly clean and bright.
